Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='GP83')

BibliographicData.Title: The intrinsic architectonic and connectional organization of the superior temporal region of the rhesus monkey

Reference.Quotation: "In case I the injection was aimed at the medial portion of the temoral pole, and the isotope was found primarily in area pAll, with a small amount of spread into adjacent area Pro…"

"In cases II and III the injections were directed at the lateral portions of Ts1 and Ts2, respectively, but in both cases the isotope was confined primarily to Ts1…in case II it extended slightly into area Pro…"

"In cases II and III the injections were directed at the lateral portions of Ts1 and Ts2, respectively, but in both cases the isotope was confined primarily to Ts1…in case III there was a small amount of spread to adjacent Ts2…"
"In case IV the injection involved the lateral and supratemporal portion of Ts2 and a small amount of Ts3 and adjacent paAlt…"
"In case V the injection was confined yto the lateral ortion of Ts3, and extended caudally into area paAlt…"
"Cases VI and VII received an injection in the supratemporal plane. Isotope in case VI occupied predominantly the medial and caudal portion of KA…"
"Cases VIII, IX, and X received isotope predominantly in area Tpt with some spread onto adjacent areas paAlt and Ts3…"

"In cases 5 and 7...the injection was placed in the supratemporal plane. In case 5 it involved KA and portions of adjacent areas paAr and paAlt."
"Case 6 received HRP mainly in Tpt with some extension into rostrally adjacent areas Ts3 and paAlt..."
